meanings.definition: Competing with someone in the same field or for the same objective.
meanings.sent1: The rivaling teams battled fiercely for the championship title.
meanings.sent2: Her rivaling skills in the game made her a tough opponent to beat.
meanings.sent3: The rivaling chefs playfully argued over who could cook the best pasta dish.
meanings.sent4: The rivaling companies fought for dominance in the market like two mighty warriors.
meanings.sent5: The rivaling siblings constantly tried to outdo each other in everything they did.

meanings.definition: Equaling or surpassing in competition or comparison.
meanings.sent1: The two rivaling companies both offered top-quality products.
meanings.sent2: Her rivaling score on the test impressed her classmates.
meanings.sent3: The rivaling students raced to finish their assignments first.
meanings.sent4: The rivaling athletes pushed themselves to the limit in the final match.
meanings.sent5: The rivaling artists showcased their talent in a friendly art competition.
